author: miriam
title: RAZ Finance: Decentralized Impact
description: A new, more conscious, generation of investors expects genuine environmental, social & governance outcomes. Self-reported data isn't enough.
solution: RAZ engages stakeholders: employees, investors, customers and communities to influence mission-driven projects while incentivizing outcomes.
experience: Certified "Best for the World" B Corporation | ESG Best Practices | Impact Measurement and Management | Web Development, Marketing and UX |
